code: import React from'react';function Todo(props){return React.createElement("li",{className:"list-group-item d-flex align-items-center"},React.createElement("input",{type:"checkbox",id:'t'+props.id,checked:props.tache.faite,onChange:function onChange(){return props.onCheck(props.tache);}}),' ',React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:'t'+props.id,className:"mb-0 ml-1"},props.tache.intitule),React.createElement("button",{className:"btn btn-danger ml-auto",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onDelete(props.tache);}},"Supprimer"));}export default Todo;
